characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: This unit may issue order to those under their command at the start of any of their Shooting phases. Orders may only be issued to INFANTRY or CAVALRY units within 6" of this unit that have the DEATH KORPS OF KRIEG keyword. To issue an order, pick a target unit and choose which order you wish to issue from teh table below. A unit may only be affected by one order per turn.

profiles.name: Death Korps Voice of Command
profiles.book: Imperial Armour - Index - Forces of the Astra Militarum
